items.title: Holiday Party
items.description: If your last name begins with A-L please bring a dessert if your last name begins with M-Z please bring an appetizer.

items.title: Charity Quilts are due TODAY
items.description: 3 yard charity Quilts are due at tonight's meeting. Check the patterns section to see the pattern.

items.title: National quilt day
items.description: Today we will be sewing the thread (spool of thread) quilt, please see the Patterns section for the printable pattern.
